Sergei Prokofiev

Ten Pieces from Cinderella, op. 97

1943

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 19'

  • 1. Spring Fairy
  • 2. Summer Fairy
  • 3. Autumn Fairy
  • 4. Winter Fairy
  • 5. Grasshoppers and Dragonflies
  • 6. Oriental Dance
  • 7. Passepied
  • 8. Capriccio
  • 9. Bourrée
  • 10. Adagio

These pieces are arrangements of music from the ballet Cinderella (op. 87). Prokofiev also created three orchestral suites from the ballet: op. 107 (which includes no. 4 of op. 97), op. 108 (which includes nos. 1–2 and 9 of op. 97) and op. 109 (which includes nos. 6 and 10 of op. 97). He further created an arrangement for cello and piano of no. 10 from op. 97.
